enumMember.name: direct
enumMember.description: Direct access to the diameter application server

enumMember.name: agent
enumMember.description: The diameter application server is accessed via an agent

derivedDataType.name: SingletonNodeName
derivedDataType.description: Type of single node name, has to be equal to 1

derivedDataType.name: WdTimeout
derivedDataType.description: Period between device watch dog requests

derivedDataType.name: RangedString64
derivedDataType.description: Must contain only letters, numbers, underscores or dashes

derivedDataType.name: EcimEmpty
derivedDataType.description: The empty built-in type represents a leaf that does not have any value, it conveys information by its presence or absence.

class.name: ServiceBasedCharging
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Diameter/@hostName)' and 'exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Diameter/@realm)'><name path='.'/>: Host name and realm must be configured under Diameter</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: serviceBasedChargingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: realm
attribute.description: Origin realm for Diameter messages

attribute.name: diameterClientPrefixOriginHost
attribute.description: Use client prefix of the session controller instance

attribute.name: hostName
attribute.description: Host name for Diameter messages

attribute.name: diameterHostId
attribute.description: Host identifier

attribute.name: hostName
attribute.description: DIAMETER host specified as fully qualified domain name

class.name: DiameterPeer
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @host satisfies ($attr = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Diameter/DiameterHost/@diameterHostId)'><name path='.'/>,host: Host must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw diameter diameter-host]</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: diameterPeerId
attribute.description: Peer identifier

attribute.name: address
attribute.description: Peer address

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: Peer port number

attribute.name: host
attribute.description: Diameter host identifier associated with the peer

attribute.name: watchdogID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: Period between device watch dog requests

class.name: DiameterApplicationSystem
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(./Peer/@peerId)'><name path='.'/>: Missing mandatory managed object 'peer'</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

action.name: resetDiameterPaths
action.description: Reset diameter path counters for a specific DAS

action.name: status
action.description: Show diameter path status information for a specific DAS

attribute.name: diameterApplicationSystemId
attribute.description: Diameter application system identifier

attribute.name: destinationRealm
attribute.description: Destination realm

attribute.name: applicationId
attribute.description:
Vendor-specific application identity:
application-identifier Application identity <application> or Vendor application identity <vendor>:<application> ro Online charging protocols based on the DCCA application gy-3gpp Online charging protocols based on the DCCA application. No support for Ericsson enhanced Gy gx Charging Rule Provisioning Protocol mbms Multimedia Broadcast Multicast Service pcc Policy and Charging Control over Gx

attribute.name: onlineChargingSystem
attribute.description: The FQDN name of the OCS sent from PCRF in AVP 619, that this DAS uses

attribute.name: allowCcSessionFailover
attribute.description: Allow failover for credit control session

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: Communication timeout

attribute.name: requestWindowSize
attribute.description: Maximum number of outstanding requests

attribute.name: requestsPerSecond
attribute.description: Maximum requests per second

attribute.name: accessType
attribute.description: Connection type

class.name: Peer
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='@peerId = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Diameter/DiameterPeer/@diameterPeerId'><name path='.'/>: Peer must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw diameter diameter-peer]</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: peerId
attribute.description: Diameter peer id

attribute.name: priority
attribute.description: Priority of the peer

attribute.name: diameterPathID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: failureThreshold
attribute.description: Failure threshold value

attribute.name: recoveryThreshold
attribute.description: Recovery threshold value

attribute.name: failureTimer
attribute.description: Failure timer value

attribute.name: resultCodes
attribute.description: Result codes treated as errors

attribute.name: agentRetryID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noSession
attribute.description: Disables session level retry

attribute.name: peerTimeout
attribute.description: Peer failover timeout

class.name: DefaultRatingParameters
class.description: Parameters sent to OCS, EDR, or both

attribute.name: defaultRatingParametersID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: httpID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noUri
attribute.description: Do not include URI in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noHost
attribute.description: Do not include hostname in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noRequestMethod
attribute.description: Do not include request method in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noContentType
attribute.description: Do not include content type in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: operatorDefinedField
attribute.description: Include customized parameter in OCS/EDR reporting

attribute.name: mmsID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noUri
attribute.description: Do not include URI in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noMmsOriginator
attribute.description: Do not include MMS originator in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noMmsDestination
attribute.description: Do not include MMS destination in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noContentLocation
attribute.description: Do not include content location from MMSC in EDR/OSC reporting

attribute.name: noMmsCcDestination
attribute.description: Do not include MMS CC destination in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noMessageType
attribute.description: Do not include MMS message type in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noMmsBccDestination
attribute.description: Do not include MMS BCC destination in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.description: Include customized parameter in OCS/EDR reporting

attribute.name: wspID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.description: Do not include URI in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noHost
attribute.description: Do not include hostname in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noPduType
attribute.description: Do not include WSP method in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noContentType
attribute.description: Do not include content type in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: operatorDefinedField
attribute.description: Include customized parameter in OCS/EDR reporting

attribute.name: smtpID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noSender
attribute.description: Do not include SMTP sender in WSP body in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noReceivers
attribute.description: Do not include SMTP receivers in WSP body in EDR/OSC reporting

attribute.name: noServerIpAddress
attribute.description: Do not include SMTP server in WSP body in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: operatorDefinedField
attribute.description: Include customized parameter in OCS/EDR reporting

attribute.name: rtspID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noUri
attribute.description: Do not include URI in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noTransport
attribute.description: Do not include the transport protocol identifier in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noRtspSession
attribute.description: Do not include the rtsp session id in EDR and OCS reporting

attribute.name: noContentType
attribute.description: Do not include content type in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: operatorDefinedField
attribute.description: Include customized parameter in OCS/EDR reporting

attribute.name: sipID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noRequestUri
attribute.description: Do not include the request URI in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noCallId
attribute.description: Do not include the Call-Id in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noMethod
attribute.description: Do not include the SIP-method in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.description: Do not include content type in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: operatorDefinedField
attribute.description: Include customized parameter in OCS/EDR reporting

attribute.name: msnID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: operatorDefinedField
attribute.description: Include customized parameter in OCS/EDR reporting

attribute.name: pop3ID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noUser
attribute.description: Do not include POP3 user in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.description: Do not include SMTP server in WSP body in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: operatorDefinedField
attribute.description: Include customized parameter in OCS/EDR reporting

attribute.name: ftpID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noFilename
attribute.description: Do not include filename in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noUserName
attribute.description: Do not include username in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noServerIpAddress
attribute.description: Do not include SMTP server in WSP body in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noFtpCommand
attribute.description: Do not include command in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noCommandArg
attribute.description: Do not include command arguments in EDR and OSC reporting

attribute.name: noSize
attribute.description: Do not include size in EDR and OSC reporting
